ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] 50+ bard songs
ygData.msgSnippet: i think we ve only gotten enchanter, cleric, and shaman spells from sky so far.  the portals for druids and wizards are available for purchase at the gypsy
ygData.messageBody:
i think we've only gotten enchanter, cleric, and shaman spells from sky so
far. the portals for druids and wizards are available for purchase at the
gypsy camp in north karana, and you can scribe them (level 34) now. no idea
on bard songs, anyone else hope we can just buy them as always? =) i heard
some spells/songs you can buy, some throught quests/research, some through
random drop, or maybe more than one of the above.

what is the new last name?

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> I dunno if they are in (maybe random drops in Sky like some
> of the caster
> spells? *shrug*), but I would like to know if anyone has
> found any of them.
> Like many of you I will most likely be hitting 51 shortly
> after logging in
> on Monday, and I WANT Song 51 ASAP! =) If the song truly is a
> 75% speed
> increase + levitate + invis + see invis, well as far as
> Kunark and it's huge
> zones are concerned, it will be the best thing since
> Wonderbread. If anyone
> gets info on where and how to obtain our new songs please
> post here as soon
> as possible.
